synopsis.text: Dagashi Kashi's second season returns with the relentless Hotaru on a mission to convert Kokonotsu Shikada into a Japanese snack food enthusiast. Despite his aspirations to become a manga artist, Kokonotsu finds himself managing his father's rundown sweet shop during his absence. As Hotaru introduces him to a variety of delicious treats, Kokonotsu must decide whether to pursue his manga dreams or take over the family business. With new faces and tempting snacks, this season promises to be a delightful journey of self-discovery and mouth-watering delicacies.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
